name: esphome
description: ESPHome is a system for controlling ESP-based devices using simple YAML configuration. It compiles firmware, manages OTA updates, and integrates with Home Assistant, making custom smart-home devices approachable without deep embedded coding.
features: YAML Configuration: Define device behavior with simple config files. No coding required.
OTA Updates: Update firmware wirelessly over the air. Convenient maintenance.
Home Assistant Integration: Seamless connection with Home Assistant. Perfect smart home pairing.
ESP Device Support: Works with ESP8266 and ESP32 chips. Wide hardware compatibility.
Custom Sensors: Create DIY smart devices easily. Endless possibilities.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your IoT devices. Privacy-focused automation.
